track: Big Data, Machine Learning, IA & Analytics
summaryAsHtml: In this live-coding session I'll use the open NYC Taxi Trip Record Data enriched with routing information and transformed into a realtime stream and walk you through some data discovery scenarios using Apache Beam. Let's see what we can find! You'll take away techniques, best practices and insights working with the new open data processing model and toolset.
title: Apache Beam, live data discovery from the open NYC Taxi Trip Records stream
summary: In this live-coding session I'll use the open [NYC Taxi Trip Record Data](http://www.nyc.gov/html/tlc/html/about/trip_record_data.shtml) enriched with routing information and transformed into a realtime stream and walk you through some data discovery scenarios using [Apache Beam](https://beam.apache.org). Let's see what we can find! You'll take away techniques, best practices and insights working with the new open data processing model and toolset.
